text: Big Happiness is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Big Happiness 1920 American silent drama film directed by Colin Campbell and starring Dustin Farnum. It was produced by Dustin Farnum and distributed through Robertson-Cole Distributing Corporation.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films: Big HappinessProgressive Silent Film List: Big Happiness at silentera.com ==Cast== *Dustin Farnum as John Dant / James Dant *Kathryn Adams as June Dant *Fred Malatesta as Raoul de Bergerac *Violet Scram as Mlle DeFarge *Joseph J. Dowling as Alick Crayshaw *William H.
